title: MFM Minisode 21
description: From the shores of a lake at the bottom of the ocean, it's a My Favorite Murder minisode! This week Karen and Georgia read your hometown murders including a neighbor with cannibalistic intentions, the Wesson Massacre, and a near miss while peeing in the woods.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
